title: Make it so blue essence can be used to make runes and rune pages.

replies.body:
Th...That's actually not a horrible idea; Riot has said they don't want RP to be spent on runes, though, and technically this could have this happen...

but i still support this, it's actually useful, though once someone has all the runes... what then?

> [{quoted}](name=Raoul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=20tuJJBY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-12T13:43:02.769+0000)
>
> Just enjoy the free stuff and stop asking for more free stuff, k?

Runes don't cost RP, they're already technically "free" I don't think you understand the situation.
Blue essence for Skin boosts in ARAM.

I own every champion and don't ever play ARAM...

I'm actually serious. I'm not trying to be a pain in the ass here. >_<
So sorry guys, we have to stop changing stuff now. Twiggles here doesn't like it.
I'm... Not entirely sure what you're getting at.
You don't do something meaning everybody else has to have that one thing worse.
Made me jiggle a bit when i read the ''Twiggles here doesn't like it'' part :P
They aren't free, time is money.
You can already indirectly spend RP on runes if you buy an IP boost.

Champions are also technically "free" and cost IP and yet they're added in the HexTech chests. Thing is, Blue Essence is fucking useless if you never get any good champion shards. Might as well convert it to runes and actually be useful in fights.

Right now, players who own every champ don't benefit from champ shards or blue essence.  But those are mostly the same players that have more IP than they'll ever need, and probably own all the rune pages and runes that they'll ever want as a result.  So would this really be the best way to expand the usefulness of champ shards/blue essence?

> [{quoted}](name=MVDuneCats,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=20tuJJBY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-12T16:57:39.767+0000)

Because there are people in the middle.

Have this problem. So far though, I've been getting skin shards only. Don't know if that's Riot setting it so that you can't get a champ you already own. As for my IP overload, I've been playing around with name change every now and then.
I think you can't get a Champion you already own, but you can get Skins you already own (which I use as 3-Fodder to make some Skin Shards permanent).

I feel it's better to stock up on orange essence for a bit before starting to do that. I do that for all the skins I don't want (skins on champs that I don't play), and saved up to about 2k+ orange essence. 

Then one day, I landed an Infernal Nasus skin (3.2k RP in shop from memory), which required about 1.5k oranges to unlock. Very very worth it imo. If you keep cycling them, eventually you come across something big like this, and you might end up having to wait a long time to collect the required essence to unlock it.

Then again, probably don't need to keep more than 2k (I think 1.5k is the most expensive category). Everything else just cycle it back for a chance to land something big on the spot.
As someone who owns literally every champion, you can get shards of things you already own, just ask the 1700 blue essence sitting there on my account that can't be used ever.
Answer me this; do they need more stuff anymore? That's practically having the whole game unlocked minus cosmetics

It's not about having more stuff. It's about getting what you paid for/earned. If you went through a lot of games with a group of friends to get chests/keys only to get a lot of champs/champ shards out of the chests when you own all of them, then that is a rip off and a big middle finger from Riot saying "screw you for already buying from us already".

I mean it'd be awesome if there were just "essence", seeing as how Champs technically don't require RP to unlock either.  Why blue vs orange? Why penalize those of us who have been playing for years and already have all of the Champs? At least let us use blue essence for icons (which, frankly, I don't care about) or ward skins
I'm missing literally 3 champs. I would love more runes so I could try different pages and builds.

I own every Champion, and ensure I grind the LP for each new one prior to Release... but I'm not even close to owning all the Runes or Pages.

I could absolutely use this option.

You really don't need all the runes though all you need are AD/ArP/Mpen/AP/Atk Spd/hybrid pen reds, Armor/HP per lvl yellows, MR/CDR/CDR per lvl blues, and Movespeed/AP/AD/Atk Spd Quints, and you literally have everything you need period

> So would this really be the best way to expand the usefulness of champ shards/blue essence?

It would certainly expand it's use, because at the moment it has but a single use, only unlocking one thing. 

Orange on the other hand can unlock considerably more.
That's actually a really great idea... At first i thought they could just convert it to IP (or RP), but i see it in a new light now, ty.
Just enjoy the free stuff and stop asking for more free stuff, k?

it would just be an alternative way to earn runes and rune pages, someone might not get any champions they want / own / could have all of them, so instead of having 5k blue essence they could get a few rune pages.

Other than the initial chest, I have gotten nothing from hextech chests so far. Unpermed shards do not count as free stuff until they have been turned into something for free and I have not acquired enough shards or essence to do that yet.

After 3 chests you should have enough essence/shards to unlock something in most cases.

> [{quoted}](name=the Anarchit3cht,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=20tuJJBY,comment-id=000100030000,timestamp=2016-04-12T21:09:30.574+0000)
>
> After 3 chests you should have enough essence/shards to unlock something in most cases.

It is highly unlikely that you can unlock anything by your third chest. That would only really be possible if all 3 of your shards were champion shards or all 3 were skin shards (or you received a ward skin and a skin shard and disenchanted the skin shard to receive a very disappointing and incredibly inefficient permed ward skin). I received 2 champion shards and 1 skin shard meaning it is impossible for me to unlock anything I have gotten from the chests (not counting any content received from the initial chest which was weighted specifically to provide me with enough drops to have something unlockable).

If you get things too fast then Riot will lose money. Not that they are focused on money, but it's just company logic. "You will get free stuff that you would otherwise have to pay for, it's slow, but still free." Like, I'v only opened a few chests myself, but knowing that I will get free stuff (even if over time) is pretty cool. :D

i've paid for chests with my left over rp, but every 3rd or 4th chest i've been able to unlock something. maybe im just lucky, but  generally you should be able to unlock something even if its not something you want. and without paying i've unlocked chests and got stuff

> [{quoted}](name=the Anarchit3cht,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=20tuJJBY,comment-id=00010003000000000001,timestamp=2016-04-13T04:04:19.519+0000)

In the long run you should get something about 3rd or 4th chest, but that's because you have a stock of shards and essence to work off of. When starting with nothing your odds of being able to perm something on your third chest (not counting the initial chest) are microscopic.

I got a good amount of Skins out of the deal... and would have had Champions but had to sell the Shards as I already own the Champs.

Got a few Icons as well, and a Ward Skin which I thought was pretty cool.

The idea is that the 'average player' can grind out 1 Free "Item" a month with this system.  Which really isn't that bad, if they are lucky enough to get something they actually like/use it's even better.

Ive already got all the rune pages and runes, what do i do then?

Should prob let people convert champion shards into skin shards.
Well the champ shards are supposed to be used for master level 6 and 7 too, but thats not out yet which makes me sad.

Chests and keys are purchasable so you could purchase those to get blue essence to get runes. Runes not being purchasable for RP is intentional to prevent arguable pay to win situations. Rune pages i could agree with certainly.
That doesn't solve the problem at all. Players who have all the champions more than likely have all the runes and pages they need.

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=20tuJJBY,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-04-12T18:02:03.685+0000)
>
> That doesn't solve the problem at all. Players who have all the champions more than likely have all the runes and pages they need.

Where does this concept come from?

I have every Champion, I probably only have 25% of all the Tier 3 Runes.
Or just get rid of Blue Essence all-together and instead add Champion shards add to your Orange essence, so you could get skins, champions, etc., so long as you have the shard.
They should eliminate blue essence entirely and have all shards disenchant to a single kind of essence, or else Hextech chests should stop giving you champion shards when you own all the champions.

Make Blue Essence able to convert to Orange (and Orange to Blue).

Even if it were at a 10:1 Ratio, I'd be fine with that.  Better than having all this Blue that I can do literally NOTHING with (I own all the Champs, and can grind the LP for each new one by Release).
But then new players will have to spent only half of eternity to get all of them. Where is fun in that?

what do i do with blue essence when i have all the champions, 20 runepages, all the runes/ip i could possibly need?

jw

but I have 20 rune pages, all the champs and every rune I want, with 250k IP for something, blue essence to a lot of players is just another useless currency riot has you earning but nothing to do with it, they should just take it out of the game along with IP. OR make it so that you can trade IP, so people can give IP to their other account, then people can trade IP for RP, and riot gets more money, as for blue essence being able to turn like 2k blue essences into a random skin shard should be a thing, but they will prolly just let it sit there and be useless like IP
Couldn't they just let you turn blue (along with orange) essence into gemstones?
{{champion:44}} gems are outrageous

As much as I support the idea and am in need of more rune pages, there's going to be a point where blue essence just accumulates for people who have all runes/rune pages, just like right now for people who have every champion/rune. I feel like Riot wants stuff in Hextech to be something that's always useful, not just sitting in your account

~~Well, you can also get all the skins in the game~~
I'm not missing the point >.>
